title: Having trouble logging in
body: Since the last patch, either league won't even get to the login page and just loads forever. If it does miraculously load, it says there was an error connecting if i try to log in. If i try to log in a second time it also just loads forever.

replies.body: If you're still having this issue, then your network may be having issues connecting the authentication servers.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to adjust your network and restore comms.  Hope it helps!
This same thing is happening to me. Please help!
